attributes.action: Change the design of the Union Flag to the one voted in on the daily telegraph website, linked to in the description
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This design was voted in on a poll on the daily telegraph website. This petition is to see it officially replace the Union Flag

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/uknews/1572168/The-new-face-of-Britain-Flag-poll-results.html

The design was originally aimed to incorporate the Welsh Dragon, and this was by far the most popular option.
